title: Aanandha Yazhai  Lyrics Thanga Meengal Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aanandha Yazhai
Singer: Sriram ParthasarathyÂ 
Movie: Thanga Meengal
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics: Na MuthuKumar

Aanandha Yazhai meetukiraai
adi nenjil vannam theetukiraai
Anbennum kudayai neetukiraai
adhil aayiram mazhai thuli kootukiraai

Iru nenjam inaindhu pesida
baashaigal edhuvum thevayillai
Siru pullil urangum paniyil
theriyum mazhayin azhago thaangavillai
un kaigal pidithu pogum vazhi
podhavillai innum vendumadi
Indha mannil idhupol yaarum ingae
engum vazhavillai endru thondrudhai

Aanandha Yazhai meetukiraai
adi nenjil vannam theetukiraai
Anbennum kudayai neetukiraai
adhil aayiram mazhai thuli kootukiraai

Dhoorathu marangal paarkudhadi
dhevadhai ivalaa ketkudhadi
thannilai marandha pookaladi
kaatrinil vaasam thookudhadi

Adi kovil edharku dheivangal edharku
unnadhu punnagai podhumadi
Indha mannil idhupol yaarum ingae
engum vazhavillai endru thondrudhai

Aanandha Yazhai meetukiraai
adi nenjil vannam theetukiraai

Un mugam paarthaal thonudhai
vaanathu nilavu chinnadhadi
Megathil maraindhe paarkudhadi
unnidam velicham ketkudhadi
Adhai kaiyil pidithu aarudhal uraithu
veetuku anuppu nallapadi

Indha mannil idhupol yaarum ingae
engum vazhavillai endru thondrudhai

Aanandha Yazhai meetukiraai
adi nenjil vannam theetukiraai (2)
